price: 147. Epai ya Nkolo wa yo nde bosembo ezali. Kozala o ntei ya bato ya tembe te.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
